scheduledClosings.title: Staff Meeting
scheduledClosings.description: We're currently closed for an important staff meeting. We'll reopen in 2 hours.

scheduledClosings.title: Upcoming - Kitchen Renovation
scheduledClosings.description: We're renovating our kitchen to bring you an even better dining experience! We'll be closed during this period but will reopen with exciting new features.

scheduledClosings.title: Future - Holiday Break
scheduledClosings.description: We'll be taking a well-deserved holiday break to spend time with our families.

emergencyClosings.title: Weather Advisory
emergencyClosings.description: Due to severe weather conditions, we may have limited hours or delivery service.
